description:
This website aims to list the maximum number of challenges, seelie, and chests for each achievement category, as well as information on how to obtain achievements related to commissions.
Lists of commissions related to achievements are also available.

Last update: November 24, 2024
description1: The document contains all commissions involving NPCs. The commissions are sorted by region, with a column on the side listing the prerequisites needed to get them, as well as another column dedicated to achievements in case the commission unlocks one.
description2:
The document lists all chests in the game.
Specific sheets indicate details according to the version in which they were added (including domains and events).
One of the sheets displays the total number of challenges, seelie, and chests for each achievement category.
description3:
The background images come from the official Genshin Impact website.
As for the stickers and icons, they are directly sourced from the game.
